DeleteAlarms.name: DeleteAlarms
DeleteAlarms.description: Grants permission to delete a collection of alarms

DeleteAnomalyDetector.name: DeleteAnomalyDetector
DeleteAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to delete the specified anomaly detection model from your account.

DeleteDashboards.name: DeleteDashboards
DeleteDashboards.description: Grants permission to delete all CloudWatch dashboards that you specify

DeleteInsightRules.name: DeleteInsightRules
DeleteInsightRules.description: Grants permission to delete a collection of insight rules

DescribeAlarmHistory.name: DescribeAlarmHistory
DescribeAlarmHistory.description: Grants permission to retrieve the history for the specified alarm

DescribeAlarms.name: DescribeAlarms
DescribeAlarms.description: Grants permission to describe all alarms, currently owned by the user's account

DescribeAlarmsForMetric.name: DescribeAlarmsForMetric
DescribeAlarmsForMetric.description:
Grants permission to describe all alarms configured on the specified metric, currently
                                                owned by the user's account

DescribeAnomalyDetectors.name: DescribeAnomalyDetectors
DescribeAnomalyDetectors.description:
Grants permission to lists the anomaly detection models that you have created in your
                                                account.

DescribeInsightRules.name: DescribeInsightRules
DescribeInsightRules.description: Grants permission to describe all insight rules, currently owned by the user's account

DisableAlarmActions.name: DisableAlarmActions
DisableAlarmActions.description: Grants permission to disable actions for a collection of alarms

DisableInsightRules.name: DisableInsightRules
DisableInsightRules.description: Grants permission to disable a collection of insight rules

EnableAlarmActions.name: EnableAlarmActions
EnableAlarmActions.description: Grants permission to enable actions for a collection of alarms

EnableInsightRules.name: EnableInsightRules
EnableInsightRules.description: Grants permission to enable a collection of insight rules

GetDashboard.name: GetDashboard
GetDashboard.description: Grants permission to display the details of the CloudWatch dashboard you specify

GetInsightRuleReport.name: GetInsightRuleReport
GetInsightRuleReport.description:
Grants permission to return the top-N report of unique contributors over a time range
                                                for a given insight rule

GetMetricData.name: GetMetricData
GetMetricData.description:
Grants permission to retrieve batch amounts of CloudWatch metric data and perform
                                                metric math on retrieved data

GetMetricStatistics.name: GetMetricStatistics
GetMetricStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistics for the specified metric

GetMetricWidgetImage.name: GetMetricWidgetImage
GetMetricWidgetImage.description: Grants permission to retrieve snapshots of metric widgets

ListDashboards.name: ListDashboards
ListDashboards.description: Grants permission to return a list of all CloudWatch dashboards in your account

ListMetrics.name: ListMetrics
ListMetrics.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of valid metrics stored for the AWS account owner

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon CloudWatch resource

PutAnomalyDetector.name: PutAnomalyDetector
PutAnomalyDetector.description:
Grants permission to create or update an anomaly detection model for a CloudWatch
                                                metric.

PutCompositeAlarm.name: PutCompositeAlarm
PutCompositeAlarm.description: Grants permission to create or update a composite alarm

PutDashboard.name: PutDashboard
PutDashboard.description:
Grants permission to create a CloudWatch dashboard, or update an existing dashboard
                                                if it already exists

PutInsightRule.name: PutInsightRule
PutInsightRule.description: Grants permission to create a new insight rule or replace an existing insight rule

PutMetricAlarm.name: PutMetricAlarm
PutMetricAlarm.description:
Grants permission to create or update an alarm and associates it with the specified
                                                Amazon CloudWatch metric

PutMetricData.name: PutMetricData
PutMetricData.description: Grants permission to publish metric data points to Amazon CloudWatch

SetAlarmState.name: SetAlarmState
SetAlarmState.description: Grants permission to temporarily set the state of an alarm for testing purposes

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon CloudWatch resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an Amazon CloudWatch resource
